attributes.action: Parents of criminals to finance their punishment in full
attributes.additional_details:
We, the good hard working and law obiding public, are absolutely sick to death of having to pay for the upkeep of criminals. We'd rather they were just dealt with properly and disposed of with capital punishment.
Until this happens, it is completely unaccenptable that the tax payer should pay even one penny for their upkeep.

We ask that all punishment (i.e. legal expenses, prison costs etc) should be fully financed by the criminals and/or immediate family members of the criminals. Those that can't pay should have assets seized. Those with no income and/or assets must have their benefits stopped.
The dept should remain until it's paid in full.

The law and punishment in this country is in an absolute mess and criminals are exploiting the governments weakness. It's high time the government starts listening to the people that pay their salary and keep them in power!!
